snippet: Rebels on Monday shelled Kadugli, in South Kordofan State, killing at least one person and wounding three, said a Sudanese Army spokesman.
abstract: Sudanese People Liberation Movement-North rebels shell Kadugli, in South Kordofan State, killing at least one person and wounding three.
lead_paragraph: Rebels on Monday shelled Kadugli, in South Kordofan State, killing at least one person and wounding three, said a Sudanese Army spokesman.

headline.main: Sudan: Rebels Shell City in a Southern Border State
headline.print_headline: Sudan: Rebels Shell City in a Southern Border State
